jyeshta upa sabhapathi - aasiyanu kalapaye pradhani stefan kalsan saha dakunu aasiyanu kalapaye kalapiya adhyaksha - oriflem kosmatiks saha indiyanu ruju alewi sangamaye sabhapathi fedrik widiwel mahathwaru.pasugiya siwu masa thuladi oriflem lanka samagama wisin 600% kata aasanna wishishta wardhanayak pennum kala.me sarthakathwaya thulin kadinamin shri lankawe thawamath grahanaya nokaragath uthuru ha nangenahira welenda polawal sandaha wishala washayen aayojanaya kirimata apeksha karanawa‚Äù yayi idiri wasare wyaparika salasum pilibandawa siya adahas dakwamin joknik mahatha prakasha kale ya.me wanawitath oriflem nishpadana siyalla uthuru ha nangenira pradeshawala alewi wima hethukota upadeshana sewa madhyasthana thunak yapanaya, thrikunamalaya saha wawuniyawa yana pradeshayanhi sthapitha kirimata oriflem lanka aayathanaya piyawara gena atha.danatamath wawuniyawe upadeshakawaru 250 k saha thrikunamalayen 600 deneku athulathwa me pradeshaye upadeshakawaru 850 kata aasanna sankhyawak sitithi.‚Äúuthuru ha nangenahira palathe aayojanayan sidu kirimata prathamawa api sancharayan kihipayak ee pradeshawala sidu karamin ehi welenda pola pilibandawa hondin adhyayanaya kala.ehidi sidu kala welenda pola paryeshanayan thulin apata peni giye mema pradeshawalin oriflem nishpadana sadaha wadi illumak pawathina bawayi.‚Äù
